As he joins stalwarts of the Pasar Malam, including --- Power Goreng Pisang, Chen's Snacks and Amma Vadai --- Salihin's humbling experience will teach him about being a better chef...and a better father.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst QuadDrive - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) The story centers on Bel Daizora, the leader of the Bey graveyard "Phantom's Gate". Bel, who holds Destruction Belfyre, declares war on Bladers across the world. With Ranzo Kiyama and Bashara Suiro, their journey unfolds as Bel advances to becoming the Dark Prince.

programme.title: Gotong-Royong S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Joining Kampung Kakis' class, Fauzie observes how volunteers educate the elderly on using smartphone. He find that children are also struggling to catch up with technology. He volunteers with Kampung Kaki and experience helping two families in need.

programme.title: Dan Mimpi Pun Berguguran - EP 2
programme.desc: Rais, Icha’s father and successful car business owner, continuously sleeps over with his secret second wife, Mazy, who is also his secretary.

programme.title: Berita - EP 130
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: National Day Message 2025
programme.desc: To mark Singapore’s 60th year of independence, Mediacorp presents a special segment featuring the Proclamation of Independence and highlights of the 1965 press conference with founding Prime Minister Lee Kuan Yew. This will be followed by the National Day Message by Acting Minister-in-charge of Muslim Affairs and Senior Minister of State for Home Affairs Faishal Ibrahim, on behalf of Prime Minister Lawrence Wong. (Malay Subtitles)

programme.title: Unboxing Art - EP 1
programme.desc: Our host, Zaki Hussain, dives into unboxing the first artform blindly and it's a Malay performance art, Dikir barat! Together with renown dikir barat group, Kelana Purba, and young talents, Nusa Sarjana, find out how these groups continue to uphold this performing art. Watch as Zaki attempts a challenge of a Dikir Barat performance.

programme.title: Born in 1965 - EP 2
programme.desc: Gurmit Singh continues his journey exploring marriage, friendship, and service leading him to Punjab, where he reflects on the importance of community and relationships in ones' golden years.

programme.title: La Luna
programme.desc: The story revolves around a small village, Kampong Bras Basah, and the unexpected opening of a women's lingerie store, La Luna.

programme.title: Patti Samayal Pethi Kitchen - EP 13
programme.desc: A cooking series that focus on vegetarian dishes, hosted by a Grandmother-Granddaughter duo

programme.title: Vallamai Tharayo - EP 31
programme.desc: Vallamai Tharayo follows the lives of Mahesh, an excellent doctor, as well as Sandhya, a chirpy art teacher and how their paths intertwine. Though Mahesh is backed by a good team of assistants he is haunted by the only failure in his career. With his competition waiting for him to fumble, his career becomes almost vulnerable. Will Mahesh and Sandhya be able to find the strength to overcome these challenges together?

programme.title: Enna Kodumai - EP 6
programme.desc: Hold onto your helmets, folks! Our host's next escapade took him 15,000 feet above sea level, where he practically touched the clouds of Rome. What's on his mind up there? Well, the producers thought it'd be a splendid idea to zip-line him across Venice at speeds that make the Flash jealous. But when the need for adventure reached its peak, our host decided. 'Enough is enough'; and bid the show farewell!

programme.title: Sandamarutham - EP 18
programme.desc: Sengoda is attacked on patrol, masked pirates strike in the dark. As Thenarasu is smuggled aboard a merchant ship, Rayar’s plan unfolds quietly beneath the chaos. Back on land, Edgar faces the consequences of his sins - a child, a choice, and eyes watching. And at sea, rumours stir below deck: this voyage is headed into a tempest. Rough waters ahead.

programme.title: Vasantham Junior Chef S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Vasantham Junior Chef is back again for another season to crown the next big junior' cooking sensation!_x000D_Vasantham Junior chef is Vasantham's first culinary competition series for talented kids between the ages of 8 to 12 who are passionate about cooking and hold a burning desire to excel in culinary skills.

programme.title: Parambarai - EP 3
programme.desc: How do we live our lives? One day at a time? _x000D_Or as threads of memories running parallel to one another all through our lives? Rajathi is caught in crossroads in both of her threads. _x000D__x000D_Forced to marry Sockalingam in her younger days and forced to relive her haunting memories as she lies unconscious in her present times. Her emotions and actions have created ripples throughout her life, affecting everyone connected to her. But the truth is starting to unravel.

programme.title: Vaan Varu Vaan - EP 19
programme.desc: VARU, a struggling writer who's trolled for her mediocre stories, is trying to write the greatest love story ever. But each time she tries to write, severe headaches, sleepiness and anything that will make her procrastinate will take over. Meanwhile VIKRAM enters her life. He has loved her from afar as a family friend for many years and now has entered into an arranged marriage alliance with her.

programme.title: Jangan Ya Dek Ya, Dia Pilih Pemeran Utama
programme.desc: Vina is to be married off to a handsome man named Ray. However, she refuses and wants to replace herself with her close friend, a durian ice cream seller named Dila. Dila ends up disguising herself as Vina. Unfortunately, it's not just Dila who is in disguise; Rei is also played by a stand-in named Kenan, who is his close friend. In the end, Kenan and Dilla meet, and they both reveal their true identities.

programme.title: Lirikan Kamu Lain Bikin Pengen Log In

programme.title: Kukira Pacar Sewaan Ternyata Ke Pelaminan

programme.title: Jangan Pinjol Hatiku, Nanti Semakin Berbunga
programme.desc: Because her family had debts, Mita's mother told her to find a rich husband so she could pay off the family's debts. Finally, she found the right husband, Dirga, who turned out to be the son of the debt collector who had lent money to her parents. How does the story continue?

programme.title: Kamu Terlalu Wah Untuk Aku Yang Hah
programme.desc: Joko is a new doctor assigned to work in Rina's village. The longer Joko stays in Rina's village, the more often he meets Rina. programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 27
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Siapa Takut Jadi Perawan Tuwir

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 39
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM

programme.title: Krack - EP 1
programme.desc: Three criminals clash with fiery police officer Potharaju Shankar, unaware they'll face imprisonment in their battle.

programme.title: Miss Shetty And Mr Polyshetty - EP 1
programme.desc: Miss Shetty, a feminist in London, wants to stay single, while Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad seeks commitment. Despite their differences, they form a connection.

programme.title: Nerungi Vaa Muthamidathe - EP 1
programme.desc: Chandru, a lorry driver, is on an assignment of transporting diesel from Trichy to Karaikal. The supposedly simple task takes on a different form when he encounters various people on the journey.

programme.title: Poovarasan - EP 1
programme.desc: Ukrapandi gets rid of his child when astrologers predict that he will bring bad luck to the family. Years later, Ukrapandi hires a worker. Little does he know that the labourer is his own son.

programme.title: Thirai Flix - EP 1
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Adade Sundara - EP 1
programme.desc: A Hindu Brahmin and a Christian girl fall in love, hiding their relationship from their parents. Their secrets unravel, leading to unexpected challenges and heartfelt revelations.

programme.title: Thirai Flix - EP 1
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.title: Pathu Thala - EP 1
programme.desc: An undercover police officer embarks on a mission to capture a crime boss and rescue a politician. However, what he discovers forces him to rethink his views on good and evil.

programme.title: Bhola Shankar - EP 1
programme.desc: In Kolkata, a taxi driver fights to build a new life with his sister, but his dark past catches up with him as he battles the city's dangerous underworld.

programme.title: Inji Idupazhagi - EP 1
programme.desc: Sweety, an obese woman, joins a slimming center but is horrified by the effects of the medicines. She starts a campaign to promote fitness over being slim.

programme.title: Karthikeya 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: A sequel to Karthikeya (2014), which deals with the personal problems of Karthikeya and how his pursuit of the truth leads him to find out the power of Indian ancient system and Tatva of Lord Sri Krishna.

programme.title: Kurangu Bommai - EP 1
programme.desc: Sundaram, a devoted employee, unquestioningly follows his superior, Ekamabaram's instructions, finding himself entangled in a risky endeavor involving the smuggling of a precious idol.

programme.title: Miss India - EP 1
programme.desc: An aspiring Indian entrepreneur confronts disapproval, sexism and rivalry as she draws from culture to start a tea business.

programme.title: Nota - EP 1
programme.desc: After a CM is charged with corruption, he is forced to pass the baton to his son. He with no political experience, finds himself stuck to the chair.

programme.title: Haraa - EP 1
programme.desc: Ram's happy life shatters when his daughter supposedly dies. He investigates, uncovering medical scams and a prostitution ring. He rescues Nimisha, revealing she was to be sold.

programme.title: Nagathaman - EP 1
programme.desc: Prithviraj a rich owner of an estate, falls in love with his servant Maheshwari.Arun Pandian a snake charmer and Mageswari's maternal uncle,is hell bent up on marrying her.A snake takes the form of Maheswari and romances with Prithviraj.This creates some confusion in the beginning and furtherleads to misunderstanding between the lovers.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal - EP 1
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and restaurant owner, falls in love with his customer Deepa. His life takes an unexpected turn when he uncovers the truth about her.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal - EP 1
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya, and Kannan, move to Bangalore for different reasons. Their journey is filled with challenges that alter their lives irrevocably.

programme.title: Bimbisara - EP 1
programme.desc: Betrayed by his brother, an ancient evil emperor is trapped in a mirror and transported to the modern world, where he desperately searches for the mirror to return to his kingdom.

programme.title: Game Changer - EP 1
programme.desc: Ram Nandan, a government official, embarks on a relentless fight against corrupt politicians. Determined to bring about fair elections, he tries to revolutionise the way the government operates.

programme.title: Yaanai - EP 1
programme.desc: In Ramnad, PRV juggles life with his two wives and kids while facing blame from another family for his brother's death. Tensions rise as their stories intertwine.

programme.title: Kuttram 23 - EP 1
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.desc: Paraplegic following a trapeze fall, Silke Pan has become a high-level athlete in paracycling. Coline Confort follows her as she prepares for the Tokyo 2020 Paralympic Games.

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 1
programme.desc: Soudeh Rad is a militant queer ecofeminist who condemns the traditional education she received in Iran. After enduring a forced marriage and domestic violence, she fled to France. She took this opportunity to launch a movement called 'Osez le feminisme' ('Dare to be Feminist') and the association 'Spectrum'.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 19
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 1
programme.desc: Five years earlier during a police operation, Volker had been responsible for young Soufiane falling to his death from a balcony. _x000D_Present day. Police officer Volker dies the same way as Soufiane, by falling from a great height, apparently with a helping hand from someone.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 2
programme.desc: Five years earlier, police officer Gerry Engler killed a young man with an iron. _x000D_Present day. Engler is found in a park, his head covered in blood: Martin Jesch had killed him with an axe...

programme.title: Loto-Meno - EP 3
programme.desc: In Canada bioidentical hormones are classed as exception drugs. In other words, you have to pay for them if you want them. Few women can afford the monthly cost. As Veronique heads off in search of those responsible, she little imagines the Pandora's box she is about to open.

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: A fine arts museum located in Pasadena, to the north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum displays a superb collection of European paintings, from Renaissance to Modern art. Classical French art is represented by Lorrain, Poussin, Fragonard, Robert, Boucher, Vernet, Vigee Le Brun...

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre - EP 4
programme.desc: In the Charleroi area, we discover a superb building with a contemporary look and a pleasing decor. Also: the Piet Hein Eek hotel, in Eindhoven; wooden swimming pools and removable terraces; the Chant des etoiles, in Spa, and how to make outdoor bicycle storage area.

programme.title: Les 100 Lieux Qu'il Faut Voir - EP 4
programme.desc: Who has never dreamed of reaching the top of Europe's most legendary summit: Mont Blanc, 4,809 metres above sea-level? We head to the ''roof of Europe'' and, along the way, discover the valley of the Haute Maurienne and the exceptional biodiversity of the Les ecrins National Park.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: La Voie Royale
programme.desc: Farmers' daughter Sophie is a brilliant sixth-form student. Encouraged by her maths teacher she leaves the family farm for Lyon, to prepare for the Grandes Ecoles. She rapidly realises that her dream of attending the elite Polytechnique are less about passing an exam than the true challenge of social mobility...

programme.title: Donovan S'evade
programme.desc: Donovan, a bodyguard, is given the job of protecting the wife of a government minister, on holiday with friends. In doing so the young man discovers a life to which he has never been entitled.

programme.title: Les Pays D'en Haut
programme.desc: Father Caron and the people of Sainte-Adele take up pitchforks and sticks and launch a revolt against Seraphin to reclaim his water. Florent and Pit arrive at the town council to reveal an important piece of information concerning the drought. Seraphin's vast financial scheme is in danger of collapsing...

programme.title: Les Pays D'en Haut - EP 4
programme.desc: The American Paper dam is the cause of the great drought in Sainte-Adele. With the plan for an aqueduct now dead and buried, Seraphin is left penniless. Blinded by anger, Seraphin has only one thing in mind: to destroy Delima.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 3
programme.desc: Visit to the three museums at the Polish Library in Paris. Shapes navigate between imaginary worlds in ceramic artist Clementine de Chabaneix's universe. Willy Chavarria, American-Mexican designer and activist, shows at the American Cathedral in Paris. Bookbinders and gilders, Nathalie and Christophe Legrand restore books which they cover in light.

programme.title: Corporate
programme.desc: emilie Tesson-Hansen, a young and brilliant HRD, is recruited to sack the aging managers of a big company. But when one of them commits suicide, the police start investigating and emilie finds herself in the firing line.

programme.title: Nature Morte
programme.desc: Juliette, a policeman, joins her father Rimbaud, a farmer, in a field. One of his cows has been killed and butchered in the night. The young woman will lead the investigation.

programme.title: Pachyderme
programme.desc: This year, as every year, Louise is left with her grandparents for a short holiday in the country. But this year turns out to be very different, it snows and a monster is about to die.

programme.title: Movie - Thambikkottai
programme.desc: Azhagiri lives with his sister Priya. While on a trip to Thambikkotai, Azhagiri gets into a dangerous situation because of the local don, but he also ends up falling in love with the don's daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Yeh Nee Romba Azhaga Irukke
programme.desc: Four youngsters go through various ups and downs in their lives when they experience unrequited love and encounter rejection.

programme.title: Movie - Jey Ram
programme.desc: Jai is a real patriot. He loses a boxing match to a Pakistani player, who thereafter humiliates India and Indians. Jai fights again and wins.

programme.title: Movie - Kadavulukku Ore Kaditham
programme.desc: Thyagu, an honest lawyer, postpones his marriage so that he can help his brother have a good future. However, things take a turn when his brother becomes a doctor.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kalamellam Un Madiyil
programme.desc: Murali, a college student, tries every way possible to impress his classmate Rani. She eventually accepts his love, but her brother opposes their union in marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Manaivikku Mariyathai
programme.desc: Priya decides to work after her husband loses his job, despite his initial reluctance. Trouble ensues when Priya's employer falls in love with her and forces her to marry him.

programme.title: Movie - Kannathil Muthamittal
programme.desc: At the age of nine, Amudha learns that she is an adopted child. Armed with a few bare facts, she desperately searches for her biological mother in the war-ridden zones of Sri Lanka.

programme.title: Movie - Dost
programme.desc: Vishwa's best friend, Raghu, betrays him for money and gets him arrested for a crime he did not commit. Soon after his release, Vishwa seeks revenge and decides to commit the crime he was jailed for.

programme.title: Movie - Azhagiya Tamil Magan
programme.desc: Guru is an MBA student who is diagnosed with ESP. Since his vision significantly improves, he runs away to Mumbai, but things take an unexpected turn when he sees his lookalike stab his girlfriend.

programme.title: Movie - Manadhai Thirudivittai
programme.desc: A student's life takes a drastic turn when he is about to marry the love of his life.

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal FM
programme.desc: A radio jockey has a fan in the form of a girl who often sends song requests. Both fall in love after talking over the phone. When it is time to meet face to face, the boy develops an inferiority complex.

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal Kisu Kisu
programme.desc: Sriram and Indu are classmates who barely know each other. But Indu's stern father begins to suspect that the two are having an affair. Thus he makes his daughter's life a miserable one.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kadhal Kirukan
programme.desc: A man is so deeply in love with his childhood friend that he is willing to go to any lengths to protect her, even commit murder.

programme.title: Movie - Meenachi Thiruvilayadal
programme.desc: The ruler of Tirumala is an ardent follower of Goddess Meenakshi, an avatar of the Goddess Parvati. Though the king strives to worship her, Narada tries to poison Goddess Parvati's mind against him.

programme.title: Movie - Thanga Magan (Old)
programme.desc: Arun returns to India to be with his family and falls in love with a dancer. He is shocked when his father saves a person who tries to kill Arun. Thereon, Arun learns many shocking facts about himself.

programme.title: Movie - Poomagal Oorvalam
programme.desc: Sarvanan, adopted by a childless couple, falls in love with Kavitha, the daughter of a caste-obsessed Sengodan. He tries to change Sengodan's attitude in order to marry Kavitha.

programme.title: Movie - Vaikundapuram
programme.desc: A jealous clerk secretly switches his newborn son with his millionaire friend's temporarily stillborn son.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: Women’s tennis has been a mainstay of Eastbourne since 1974’s inaugural Eastbourne Open. The tournament is played on outdoor grass courts, and is generally considered a "warm-up" for the Wimbledon Championships. programme.title: Badminton Unlimited 2025

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Canadian Open is a prestigious professional tennis tournament held annually in Montreal and Toronto. The tournament alternates between Montreal and Toronto each year. Toronto’s Sobeys Stadium holds 12,500 tennis fans, while Montreal’s IGA Stadium holds 11,500.It is the second-oldest active tennis tournament in the world.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of women’s sport.

programme.title: Badminton Weekly 2025

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 15
programme.desc: Steve McManaman revisits ten standout moments from his Premier League career, from his breakthrough at Anfield to unforgettable solo goals and Merseyside derby magic. With flair, humour and personal insight, PL Moments takes you inside the story of one of the Premier League's most creative and entertaining players.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 42
programme.desc: With the remnants of the celebratory confetti barely gone from the Anfield pitch, Curtis Jones joins the Big Interview to reflect on an historic title-winning season. Having signed for his beloved team at just 9 years of age, the Liverpool born and bred midfielder explains just how much the title triumph means to him and sheds light on the impact of Arne Slot and the differences in approach of his new manager compared to Jurgen Klopp.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.desc: Highlights from the season's final matchweek where we'll see Champions Liverpool lift the trophy in front of a packed Anfield. Forest take on Chelsea as the battle for Europe reaches it's climax. Manchester United host Villa, and Everton travel to Newcastle on a day that's sure to be packed full of drama.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 29
programme.desc: From his humble beginnings at Queen's Park in Scotland to becoming a key player for Liverpool, Andy Robertson's rise is a tale of resilience, hard work, and determination. We delve in to his early struggles, his breakthrough at Hull City, and his crucial role in Liverpool's historic Premier League and Champions League triumphs.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimarães to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.desc: FPL experts crunch the numbers and give their opinions on which Premier League stars you should be selecting ahead of GW1.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: FS MMA Nick Thompson vs. Dustin Denes
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! It's a quick knockout inthe main event as Nick Thompson slugs it out against Dustin Denes in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Berto vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undeafeated Andre Berto (25-0, 19 KOs) in his 4th defense of the WBC Welterweight Title as he takes on former WBO Champion Carlos 'El Indio' Quintana (27-2, 21 KOs) at the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA on April 10, 2010.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Men's CMX Forms and Weapons, and a World Record Break by Chip Townsend at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Juan Diaz
programme.desc: This episode features a lightweight title bout between Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Arturo Gatti vs. Carlos Baldomir
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a welterweight world championship contest featuring Arturo Gatti and Carlos Baldomir. Baldomir looks to continue his rise in the welterweight ranks. Also on the card, a classic welterweight title brawl between Andre Berto and Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1 from Tokyo, Japan at the Ryogoku Kokugikan, features Mitakeumi, Takakeisho, Wakatakakage and Takanosho.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Nick Thompson vs. Dustin Denes
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! It's a quick knockout inthe main event as Nick Thompson slugs it out against Dustin Denes in Costa Rica.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 83
programme.desc: The Teletubbies enjoy a game of 'What's your name?' Later, there's a surprise when a bowl of Tubby Custard joins in with the game!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'whale' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We meet lots of different whales. We see swimming whales, splashing whales and even a singing whale!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: The friends are joining Hooper's circus school. But when Plom struggles to find a skill he's good at, will he be able to earn his circus school certificate?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: Hey, who turned out the lights? Messy goes to OKIDO and finds out electricity can lead to music, lights and disco dancing!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 19
programme.desc: Glitch sinks in the Panama Canal and needs saving... again.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head to Chihuahua, Northern Mexico to discover how a colony of black tailed prairie dogs protect their pups from prowling bull snakes, hawks and coyotes as the pups take their critical first steps above ground.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog who loves to help people when they are worried with big soft cuddles. Sylvie and Katrina help a young boy named Alfie visit his great-grandfather.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a connection between them in the wild. This time, it's the sun bear and the rainbow lorikeet.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 13
programme.desc: Captain Captain has been reading about how captains of yonder years had 'butlaarrrs' in the Olde Book of Piratey Historrry. Captain Captain wonders if Sandy and Seaweed could try being her butlers!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 15
programme.desc: Darcy the tunnel boring machine makes some mistakes on her first day, but she soon makes up for it when everyone sees what she can really do.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 35
programme.desc: Sarah is fascinated by some mysterious music coming from the hedge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 36
programme.desc: Sarah & Duck do a spot of gardening.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Fifi asks Stanley to help them find a Mermaid so they can take its picture for school. They explore the ocean floor in their search where they encounter lots of ocean creatures.

programme.desc: Monty and Gran disagree over ice cream flavours, leaving him unsure if people who like different things can still be friends.

programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 19
programme.desc: Glitch sinks in the Panama Canal and needs saving... again.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Raspberry sings a song, saying it's cool to be kind.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's the magical Pineapple attempting to perform a very difficult magic trick with the help of Kiwi.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 84
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po enjoy a game of musical statues. It takes the Teletubbies a few turns to work out what to do when the music stops; they must stand very still.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'bee' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bees. There are stripy bees, buzzy bees, and yellow, black and fuzzy bees.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: It's Christmas time in Pop Paper City. Plom and Zip are decorating the tree, so they craft a new Christmas star. When Plom loses the star, its unknown if he and Zip will be able to find it again.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Messy and friends rocket into space, but a mischievous Messy sends OKIDO's seasons into chaos! Time to fix this planet wobble.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Rayane takes a starring role in the big drama club play, with Diesel right by his side.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet an aye aye. They see how this night-loving lemur has one extraordinarily long finger, that it uses to tap on tree branches to find hollows full of bugs. Next Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet some Prevost's squirrels.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 14

programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.desc: Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Messy and friends rocket into space, but a mischievous Messy sends OKIDO's seasons into chaos! Time to fix this planet wobble.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Rayane takes a starring role in the big drama club play, with Diesel right by his side.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet an aye aye. They see how this night-loving lemur has one extraordinarily long finger, that it uses to tap on tree branches to find hollows full of bugs. Next Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet some Prevost's squirrels.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 14
programme.desc: Captain Captain wants to get Sandy, Seaweed and herself into the Big Book of Pirate World Records and sets the pirates the task of trying to break a record to get their names in the book!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 16
programme.desc: A bit bored by her surroundings, Emily longs to go on a fun adventure and experience something new and exciting. It's not long before her wish is granted.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 36
programme.desc: Sarah & Duck do a spot of gardening.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: When the zip on Sarah's hoodie breaks, Scarf Lady suggests a trip to the haberdasher.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: There are leaves all over the place, Stanley tries to gather them up in his van with his leaf blower, but it is harder than he thought and fills Myrtle's house with them instead.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Fifi asks Stanley to help them find a Mermaid so they can take its picture for school. They explore the ocean floor in their search where they encounter lots of ocean creatures.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: When Stan is too scared to go into the cellar, Monty wonders if even adults get scared.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: Captain Chloe's adventures through space inspire JoJo and Gran Gran, who make a visit to the space centre to see the planets.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, Tomato changes colour.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Raspberry sings a song, saying it's cool to be kind.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Supertato's Tato belt gets locked inside a glass case for an exhibition, but Tomato can't remember the code to get it out again, and Supertato needs it back to defeat Evil Pea.

programme.desc: Tinks helps Charli with some litter picking in the park. But the gate to the bins is locked, and the recycling van is on its way. Can Tinks fetch park ranger Pauline in time?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: This episode features the Indian peafowl and the gorilla - their wild connection is they are dimorphic, meaning the male and female have a different appearance.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 15
programme.desc: Captain Captain is busy looking at last year's Pirate Yearbook, but something is wrong with her picture! So Captain Captain tells the pirates to come up with a better photo for this year's edition!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Trouble brews in Jamaica when Glitch's campfire threatens a coffee plantation.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 17
programme.desc: Lorenzo decides to play a dangerous trick on his loyal coach Beppe.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 37
programme.desc: When the zip on Sarah's hoodie breaks, Scarf Lady suggests a trip to the haberdasher.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 38
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck join Scooter Boy at the cinema to watch his favourite film.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: Cynthia is working on the bus so asks Stanley to take her passengers to the community centre. He uses Amare's tractor and trailer, his car, a boat, and a bath to make a Bus-Train.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: There are leaves all over the place, Stanley tries to gather them up in his van with his leaf blower, but it is harder than he thought and fills Myrtle's house with them instead.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: The Kazoops house is feeling a bit crowded, so Monty imagines what it would be like if he and Jimmy Jones lived by themselves.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 25
programme.desc: When JoJo and Gran Gran call Great Gran Gran, they learn it's Jounen Kweyol (Creole Day) in Saint Lucia. To celebrate, Gran Gran teaches JoJo some words in Creole.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20

programme.title: DORA S1 - EP 111

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Oh has an electric spark when he and Tip do the ultimate best friend handshake./Tip can't get Slushious back until she passes a Boovian Driver's Test.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Oh throws a slumber party to take his friendship game to the next level with Tip's classmates/Kyle will do whatever it takes to keep Oh accident-free.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 31
programme.desc: Garby and Click-Clack must rescue the Dinotruxafter they are tied down by a destructive tribe of Slamtools who made an evil deal with D-Structs

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: When a meteorite crashes into the Penthouse, Sherman transforms into a superhero and things go from bad to worse when Hobson turns into a supervillain

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Accidental Hero In order to win the Fright Stuff Award, Casper consults his uncles for scaring advice. Rich Kid Ra When Ra pulls up to Scare School in a solid gold chariot, everyone suddenly wants to be his best friend.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 31
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening at the farm - all Farmer Tom's lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 83
programme.desc: Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 31
programme.desc: All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that they’re cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s "fun-crastinating" puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 11

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 11

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 156
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 111
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Movin' To The Country S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Craig sets off to Nyngan in the Orana region of central west NSW to meet two former big city lawyers who run a national legal enterprise from home, while also inventing a brand-new species of cow in their lunchtime.

programme.title: Dream Gardens S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: A family revive their tired old garden to complement their new country style home. But can they mitigate the risks from bushfires to create a garden that is both safe and beautiful?

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 27
programme.desc: Who really wins in a class action? Anne Connolly reveals how some class actions have become a brazen money-making exercise for lawyers and litigation funders, leaving people feeling sidelined, short-changed and exploited.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money

programme.title: U.s. Markets Edition 2025

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: This is the tale of Brazil's largest bank robbery. At the heart of this crime is South America's most dangerous mafia and a daring heist which took place on what's now known as the "Night of Terror".

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom. But some former members say it was a global multilevel-marketing maze that left them financially and emotionally devastated.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Rainbow Mountain offers tourists a picture-perfect view that has flooded social media feeds. But behind this viral beauty spot is the story of a community at war and cries for help ignored.

programme.title: Bullish with Sonali Basak S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Finance is an industry dominated by men, but women are rising and controlling more wealth globally. How did the women of Wall Street break through, and what's changing now that they have?

programme.title: Bullish with Sonali Basak

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Negeri 5 Menara
programme.desc: Six best friends in the Islamic Boarding School often hang out near the mosque towers. All of them made a promise under the tower that one day, they will go to places that they have been dreaming about.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S2
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S3
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour S3
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy

programme.title: The Travel Note
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host._x000D_The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk

programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Spanish in a Happy Mood
programme.desc: Let’s learn simple and easy-to-remember phrases, looking at a modern Europe that cherishes its history and traditions while pursuing a lifestyle that fits its stature. Furthermore, we explore tips for "happiness" and various forms of "joy" through the unique European way of thinking and values behind their languages and lifestyles.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery (R)
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Eps. 93 (R)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: Today's Close-up 80 Years After the War Special "Hope for Tomorrow as Told Throu
programme.desc: In 2025, as we mark 80 years since the end of World War II, we reflect on the journey Japan has taken. NHK's archival footage contains enduring images of people who, with hope, have continued striving for a tomorrow better than today. The program revisits key figures and events from each era, while focusing on present-day challenges-such as passing on memories of war-and considers how we move forward.

programme.title: TV Exercise
programme.desc: Short program to introduce physical exercise for the young and old.

programme.title: Health for Today
programme.desc: Difficult to understand medical care is easily explained in this program as well as tips on healthcare.

programme.title: Transcending Happiness (R)
programme.desc: The show features couples, parent and child, and friends talking about the different forms of happiness that they have discovered together throughout their life.
